Regulation Name(s): Assayed Quality Control Material For Clinical Microbiology Assays
Methodologies: Qualitative detection of Gram-negative bacteria and antimicrobial resistance genes
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Streck MDx-Chex for BC-GN quality control kit for Luminex VERIGENE Gram-Negative Blood Culture Nucleic Acid Test
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as external positive and negative assayed control to monitor qualitative detection of Gram-negative bacteria and associated antimicrobial resistance genes by the Luminex VERIGENE BC-GN test; not intended to replace manufacturer controls provided with the device.
